name: Space Jump: The Prototype And Beyond
name_original: Space Jump: The Prototype And Beyond
description:
Controls:

A,D: move left  and right

Space: jump

R: restart

In space, no one can hear you jump. 

In space, no one can see you jump.

In space, no one can jump you jump.

In space, no one can eat you jump.

Feel free to leave a comment below about what you love and most importantly, what you hate about this game. :)
